body:
### Introduction
I have used phpBB for quite some time and it has always been my favorite bulletin board software. However, I feel that the UI has not been updated for ages. So I decided to use the Bootstrap framework to spice things up.

### Template name
proBoot

### Inherits from
proSilver

### Version
1.0

### Author
@shibulijack

### Installation
* Download the source files.
* Unzip the files to **/styles/proboot** folder.
* Install the style via **ACP -> Styles**

### Screenshots
![An example forum](http://shibulijack.files.wordpress.com/2012/12/screen-shot-2012-12-06-at-5-28-26-pm.png)

![An example post](http://shibulijack.files.wordpress.com/2012/12/screen-shot-2012-12-06-at-5-14-59-pm.png)

![Index](http://shibulijack.files.wordpress.com/2012/12/screen-shot-2012-12-06-at-5-13-24-pm.png)
name: Proboot
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
